doctext: in another act of violence , 18 people were killed near can ##as ##gor ##das in anti ##o ##qui ##a department . ep ##l ( popular liberation army ) guerrillas blew up a bridge as a public bus , in which several policemen were traveling , was crossing it . the attack killed nine policemen and nine civilians , including four employees of the civil registry office , who had been in pe ##que on sunday for the election of a new mayor . the bloody attack occurred in junta ##s de ur ##ami ##ta , where the injured are being treated .
